ingredients.ingredient: 2 ½ tablespoons Hawaiian sea salt, divided

cookingTips: Wrap pork tightly in foil after rubbing with salt and liquid smoke for tender, flavorful results
Slow roast at 350°F for 6-7 hours until meat shreds easily
Save the pork drippings to pour over shredded meat for added moisture and flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create authentic Hawaiian kalua pork flavors at home using oven-roasting and liquid smoke.
